    • Uses of Command in edu.hm.cs.kniffel.logic.command

      Classes in edu.hm.cs.kniffel.logic.command that implement Command 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CommandRollDiceCup
      A command for rolling the DiceCup.
      class  CommandSave
      This command will save an object upon execution.
      class  CommandToggleDiceActive
      A command that will, upon execution, set the state of a dice to inactive or active, depending on its current state, where inactive means that when the DiceCup is rolled the next time the specified dices value won't change.
      class  CommandTurnEnd
      A command which will handle the end of the turn.
      class  CommandWriteScore
      A command which will handle the end of the turn.
